programme.desc: Food connects people! A feast for the eyes that spotlights the cuisines of China in a way that’s bound to set the mouths of the whole globe watering!

programme.title: Youthful China
programme.desc: The youth of a country is the future of that country. A series of documentaries focusing on the younger generation of China in which you get to see what they are achieving and what makes them tick!

programme.title: Pixel Collage
programme.desc: A well-crafted collage of selected short documentaries telling stories about all aspects of China! People, technology, culture, and wildlife, all are showcased in Internet-friendly form.

programme.title: Today’s Top Pick
programme.desc: Documentaries in this slot are rebroadcasts of our most-viewed and most popular stories of the season. They feature important social, economic, environmental or other policy-driven issues, affecting lives nationwide or simply in one small village. A broad selection of top productions by Chinese top documentary producers.

programme.title: Humanities and Geography
programme.desc: A strand devoted to the nature and wildlife of China, the people who lived alongside them, and the great and diverse landscapes with which they all contend.

programme.title: Living China
programme.desc: Real life stories told from the personal perspective. Moving, dramatic, sorrows and joys, expressed emphatically and expressed quietly. Watch closely to see and understand the real China as it is lived.

programme.title: Special Edition
programme.desc: Prestige Chinese documentary production, tackling serious subjects with the best cinematography, editing, and all round production values with a unique Chinese perspective.

programme.title: DOCUMENTAL
programme.desc: Presentapersonajes y acontecimientos típicos, avances y descubrimientos tecnológicos y científicos, y la civilización social de China.

programme.title: ASÍ ES CHINA
programme.desc: Descubre para el televidente el gran legado cultural e histórico de las distintas regiones y etnias de China. También le acerca a la vida y las costumbres de la gente común y le muestra la evolución del país en aspectos como educación, sociedad y protección del medio ambiente y del patrimonio histórico y natural.

programme.title: CGTN NOTICIAS
programme.desc: Es el informativo estelar del canal, con las últimas noticias del acontecer político, social, deportivo y cultural de China y el resto del mundo. Los hechos que constituyen titulares están aquí, en CGTN Noticias.

programme.title: PRISMA
programme.desc: Prisma es un programa cultural producido por CGTN en español en colaboración con el multimedio de comunicación latinoamericano teleSUR. Su objetivo es mostrar a los televidentes la riqueza cultural de China y el mundo hispanohablante, elevar el conocimiento de la cultura china en los países de habla hispana y establecer una plataforma de diálogo entre ambas partes. Se trata de un programa mensual de 30 minutos de duración que comenzó a emitirse en agosto de 2016. Está compuesto de tres segmentos que destacan por su diversidad temática. Primero, un espacio de noticias culturales; después, una semblanza de alguna personalidad del ámbito cultural latinoamericano; y finalmente un documental sobre aspectos de la cultura china.

programme.title: RONDA ARTÍSTICA
programme.desc: Se exhibe la diversidad de cantos y danzas, óperas locales tradicionales, música y artes folklóricas de China.

programme.title: AMÉRICA AHORA
programme.desc: Es un programa nuevo del canal, de corte noticioso con estilo de revista, y que se transmite una vez a la semana. Aquí ofrecemos reportajes y análisis en profundidad sobre los temas más debatidos y de mayor actualidad en la zona americana, y en especial en América Latina.

programme.title: DÍALOGO
programme.desc: Convoca a celebridades, eruditos y funcionarios gubernamentales tanto de China como del exterior, para debatir temas de palpitante actualidad e interés general y de proyección internacional.

programme.title: DOCUMENTAL
programme.desc: Presentapersonajes y acontecimientos típicos, avances y descubrimientos tecnológicos y científicos, y la civilización social de China.

programme.title: EL PROYECTOR
programme.desc: Acérquese a la vida de la China antigua y moderna a través de las producciones dramáticas de CGTN-Español. La combinación perfecta de historia y ficción chinas en la pantalla de su televisor.

programme.title: What Could Be Bad: Episode 110 - Creative Community with Steph Johnson
Spotlight: New York City Mayor Eric Adams at Bitcoin 2025 conference in Las Vegas
programme.desc: New York City Mayor Eric Adams made a prominent appearance at the Bitcoin 2025 conference in Las Vegas, held from May 27 to May 29, 2025.

programme.title: Apex Fusion: Bridging the Blockchain Divide
programme.desc: Imagine a world where blockchains don’t speak different languages. Where Ethereum and Bitcoin don’t just coexist but they collaborate. In this episode we sit down with the visionary founders behind Apex Fusion, a bold layer1 project on a mission to unify the fractured blockchain universe. With a tri-chain architecture and a bridge that actually works, they are not just building tech - they are potentially laying down the infrastructure for the next evolution of web3.

programme.title: TRUMP TO SIGN HUGE $9 TRILLION CRYPTO EXECUTIVE ORDER TODAY
programme.desc: Trump is set to sign an executive order today allowing crypto, gold, and private equity in 401(k) plans! With this, we could see $9 trillion enter the market!

programme.title: Crypto Staking LEGAL in the USA?! BULL MARKET ABOUT TO EXPLODE
programme.desc: The U.S. SEC has exempted liquid staking services from securities regulation, which means top platforms like Lido on Ethereum, and Jito on Solana, are now fully compliant! This is huge news for the industry as a whole and we should be celebrating!

programme.title: Navigating the Future of Finance: AI, Web3, and the Role of Stablecoins at Proof of Talk Paris 2025
programme.desc: Live from Proof of Talk Paris 2025, this episode of The Edge of Show explores the evolution of digital finance, security, and real-world blockchain utility with four visionary leaders shaping the next phase of Web3. First, we spoke with Stephan Lutz, CEO of BitMEX, who shared insights on exchange security, AI-assisted trading, and how BitMEX is navigating a more responsible approach to token listings and trader education. Next, we sat down with Nkiru Uwaje, CEO of Mansa, to learn how her team is powering cross-border payments with stablecoins and building liquidity rails for Africa, Southeast Asia, and Latin America. Then we spoke with Jason Jiang, Chief Business Officer at CertiK, who outlined how real-time monitoring and smarter compliance tools are transforming security in blockchain—and why regulators are finally catching up. Lastly, Damu Winston from Amazon Web3 joined us to discuss the convergence of Web3, AI, and spatial computing—plus a surprise appearance from his personal AI agent Samir, who gave us a glimpse into the not-so-distant future.

programme.desc: A group of individuals discuss a job to take out their enemy, Splashy. They plan to be prepared and get the antidote from their boss. Another individual asks about the whereabouts of Bee and Bow and is told they need a password. Slowy visits with news that Greeny is planning to destroy the bay and river to find silver. The group plans to use persuasion to stop him but is interrupted by the arrival of unknown individuals.

programme.title: Ultimatum
programme.desc: Greeny asks Slowy if theyre ready, but Slowy has just given bad news to Splashy about the bosses wanting to take over their territory. They need to prepare for action and meet at Splashys place. The attackers arrive and give them an ultimatum, but Slowy has a defense system ready.

programme.title: Rescue Mission
programme.desc: The Buster Gang bravely faces a daunting challenge as they encounter a massive meteor hurtling toward Q-Town. Despite their past misdeeds, they are determined to do the right thing and save the community they have come to cherish. However, their efforts are met with skepticism and doubt from those around them. With time running out, the fate of Q-Town hangs in the balance. Will the Buster Gang overcome their past and prove their worth in this crisis?

programme.title: Flashs Resolution
programme.desc: The unexpected thunder and lightning may have caught us off guard, but we must keep pushing forward. Despite Flame and Thunders injuries, Flash remains undeterred. The Buster Gang may have caused destruction, but we have the strength and determination to overcome any obstacle.

programme.title: EARLY GRAVE
programme.desc: After ten years apart, six people are summoned to the isolated island estate of one of their former friends, now a famous horror writer. Once there, separated by guilt, yet bound together by a terrible secret, seven fractured adults try to reconnect with each other, and take stock of their lives.Outside, the storm clouds gather. Rain, lightning and wind isolate the house by washing out the road and knocking down the power lines. The group is stranded at the estate, and unable to get off the island. Then, they begin to be brutally murdered one by one.Someone is out there in the wind and the rain, someone who has waited ten years to wreak a bloody vengeance on this group. Seven friends find themselves in a struggle to survive and outwit a diabolical killer who is savagely committed to sending them all to an EARLY GRAVE.

programme.title: 2XUNO

programme.title: Deivamagal Episode 18
programme.desc: Deivamagal is an Indian Tamil-language soap opera starring Vani Bhojan and Krishna. It was broadcast on Sun TV initially from Monday to Friday and later extended to Saturday at 8 PM from 25 March 2013 to 17 February 2018 for 1,466 episodes. The show replaced S. Kumarans successful soap, Thirumathi Selvam, and replaced by Nayagi. The show is produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S. Kumaran. This serial was shot in Pollachi, Chennai, Chengalpet, Hyderabad, Kerala, Puducherry, and Cuddalore. This is the first TV serial shot in the Bay of Bengal Plot Prakash his wife Sathyapriya and his eldest sister-in-law Gayathris conspiracies against their families to conquer Prakshs ancestral property Jai Hind Vilas.

programme.title: Interview with K.R.Vatsala | Thirumathi Selvam

programme.title: Naayagi Episode 36
programme.desc: Nayagi is a 2018 Indian Tamil-language Family Drama series. It premiered on 19 February 2018 on Sun TV, replacing Deivamagal, and was replaced by Anbe Vaa and it ended on 31 October 2020. The show was produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S Kumaran. Nayagi was also re-aired on Kalaignar TV from 1 March 2021 and it ended its run on 9 July 2022 Plot Anandhi, a middle-class woman, struggles to keep her life together while dealing with an alcoholic father and his debts. programme.title: BADminton
programme.desc: Marco & Polo are playing badminton in the backyard like a sweet family. Then the shuttle cock falls on Cats head as he is about to catch Keet.

programme.title: OH, RATS!
programme.desc: It’s quiet…TOO quiet, according to Pai, who’s convinced Negu’s about to attack. Pai prepares a trap. But the evil lord of the Chou World is depressed by all his failures. Mei decides to launch an attack himself. He can only get one mutant rat to follow him…who in turn is followed by lots of fellow mutant rats. The Guardians laugh at Mei and his rats, but the rats have a secret weapon: horrible, high-pitched SCREAMS! Pai knits earmuffs for himself, April, and Xia, then lures the rats onto his trap with cheese. In the end, Pai savors the silence.

programme.title: The Start of Me
programme.desc: Hey kids! Emmie our cute little elephant loves dancing & sings good english songs. Its time to enjoy the pirate song & more with Emmie! Sway and listen to great kids song like Pirate song , Rain, Catch a wave and hula hoop! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats!

programme.title: SOMETHING STINKS
programme.desc: Negu has his henchmen pump a foul green fog up to the Yan World, forcing the Elders to evacuate the Westerly Breeze. Aboard the Lord of the Wind, Pai fails to impress the Elders and gets “Rocky Rodent” – a crisis of confidence. The Elders have to pump Pai’s confidence back up so he can help Xia and April defeat the Worm Monster sent by Negu.

programme.title: MeetZonicornEne
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: An Eerie Hustle
programme.desc: Don finally gets to play tit for tat with the mice and they are running for their lives. Don’s house turns into haunted house and the ghost of Don is hungry for some dead meat preferably dead mice meat.

programme.title: Cricket Match
programme.desc: Keet and Cat decides to play a game of cricket in the backyard with their own set of teams.

programme.title: Love in the World
programme.desc: Hey kids! Emmie our cute little elephant loves dancing & sings good english songs. Its time to enjoy the pirate song & more with Emmie! Sway and listen to great kids song like Pirate song , Rain, Catch a wave and hula hoop! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats!

programme.title: Ghost Attack
programme.desc: Its Friday the 13th. Cat is watching a late night horror movie and all creeped out when it ends…a perfect opportunity for Keet to get even.

programme.title: Cinema Night
programme.desc: Blockbusters have released and Don and Colonel are in the theatre to get tickets. But the naughty rats pick their pocket and buy tickets. Now the dogs are penniless and would go to any extend to get into the theatre. But when the trio enters the picture, the poor dogs suffer like anything. But, Larry Marly and Charly will end up in deep mess. Wait and watch!

programme.title: JOY RIDE
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to clean the Lord of the Wind. They can’t resist riding the annual Surf Winds, but Xia and April end up captured by the Wind Beast. Pai rescues them by repulsing the sensitive Wind Beast with his onion and sulfur-geyser stink.

programme.title: CHICKEN!
programme.desc: To earn his Orange Underbelt, Pai thinks he’s going to fight Xia in a chicken costume. But he ends up having to fight Negu’s giant chicken mutant, which can fire toxic eggs!

programme.title: Car Trouble
programme.desc: Colonel buys a brand new car and brings it to show off to his bro Don. But Larry Marly and Charly would just not let it happen. The dog bros put their lives in danger to save the shiny four wheeler. But alas! All that is left of the car is its crumpled skeleton. Thank God the rats spared their lives!

programme.title: The Grasshopper and the Ant
programme.desc: The long, freezing winter has arrived for both the Ants, who worked hard from Spring to Autumn, and the Grasshopper, who sang and played all along.

programme.title: Who Ate it?
programme.desc: There’s one last donut in the house – and 3 hungry donut lovers... each one of them determined that no one (other than them) gets it!

programme.title: FIRE AWAY!
programme.desc: On a chilly morning, Xia tries to heat things up with his Golden Katana, but keeps accidentally setting fires. He does no better as the Dragon Warrior. When Negu sends a mutant Heat Monster, the Guardians will have to fight fire with fire…or possibly water.

programme.title: BeAFriend
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: Bicycle Chase
programme.desc: It’s a lovely day . Dunky is busy oiling his old cycle - until Cat comes around snatches the cycle , removes its wheels and rolls it to the top of the house chasing Keet even on the electric cables.

programme.title: Imaginary Friend
programme.desc: As Gummy starts spending more and more time with his imaginary friend, Harry and Kala soon start wondering if he’s nuts – or they are!

programme.title: Whirlwind
programme.desc: Deedee is sadly whirling the magic wand wondering what to do. But no matter what Nino suggests, Deedee wants to have the magical version of it all, be it baking a cake or even walking. Finally they decide on the giant jumble jigsaw. Inspite of Nino’s efforts to have a non-magic activity, Deedee’s magic seems to be only solution to tackling the over-sized pieces. But the spell literally whips up a storm. Deedee struggles to control the whirlwind, but it whizzes past out of control into the field ahead. The jigsaw pieces fall in place perfectly but the whirlwind hasn’t stopped. The whirlwind becomes so naughty that it snatches Deedee’s magic wand away. The whirlwind wildly knocks down everything in its path and throws out all the things inside Tiggy’s house. Not to mention the letters of postman Charlie. Even though all are shaken up pretty much by the naughty whirlwind, Deedee is encouraged by all her friends to catch it. The whirlwind even plays mischief with the Tika Pila monster and also the Mayor! The Mayor falls with a bump out of the whirlwind, but luckily with Deedee’s wand. They decide to wear-out the whirlwind safely without magic. They come up with a plan and together do their thing. The whirlwind gradually gets tired and so does the magic wear off. Although it messed up the town, all of them have quite a laugh.

programme.title: Yogi Don
programme.desc: One fine day a courier comes for Don – a yoga training guide. Now Don is all yogic and spiritual. Phew!! The trio just can’t take all this. And when they get into action, Don sees all seven heavens from the yoga mat itself.

programme.title: A Bumpy Trek
programme.desc: Don and Colonel went up the hill, to feast a platter, Colonel fell down and broke his bones and Don came tumbling after. Rocky terrain of the magic mountain and a sleepy Don is indeed a disastrous combination. So what you think awaits the team on the peak of this mountain?

programme.title: Playmates
programme.desc: A peaceful day. Don is watering his plants and suddenly the water stops. He jerks the hose, pokes a stick into it, but doesn’t realize that it’s the mice who are causing this water explosion! Don has to take revenge, and this time he sits on his couch with a bunch of fire crackers! Will he set the house on fire?

programme.title: Smighty Frighty
programme.desc: In this Halloween-themed story, Sneevil and Biggs get the scare of the lifetime when the Spooky Smighties decide to teach them a lesson in the middle of Fright Forest.

programme.title: THE PAI WHO CRIED WOLF
programme.desc: To discover his powers as the Rodent Warrior, Pai goes on a solo night quest. But he keeps seeing the Wolf Warrior (Koto and Amkko in a disguise made by Mei). He runs to tell April and Xia, who don’t believe him. He battles the Wolf Warrior, discovering his Rodent Warrior powers (Super-Burrowing and Super-Cheeks) as he reveals Koto and Amkko inside the disguise.

programme.title: Whirlwind
programme.desc: Deedee is sadly whirling the magic wand wondering what to do. But no matter what Nino suggests, Deedee wants to have the magical version of it all, be it baking a cake or even walking. Finally they decide on the giant jumble jigsaw. Inspite of Nino’s efforts to have a non-magic activity, Deedee’s magic seems to be only solution to tackling the over-sized pieces. But the spell literally whips up a storm. Deedee struggles to control the whirlwind, but it whizzes past out of control into the field ahead. The jigsaw pieces fall in place perfectly but the whirlwind hasn’t stopped. The whirlwind becomes so naughty that it snatches Deedee’s magic wand away. The whirlwind wildly knocks down everything in its path and throws out all the things inside Tiggy’s house. Not to mention the letters of postman Charlie. Even though all are shaken up pretty much by the naughty whirlwind, Deedee is encouraged by all her friends to catch it. The whirlwind even plays mischief with the Tika Pila monster and also the Mayor! The Mayor falls with a bump out of the whirlwind, but luckily with Deedee’s wand. They decide to wear-out the whirlwind safely without magic. They come up with a plan and together do their thing. The whirlwind gradually gets tired and so does the magic wear off. Although it messed up the town, all of them have quite a laugh.

programme.title: What a mess!
programme.desc: The twins meet a girl who lost the key to her bike lock because she’s so untidy.

programme.title: The rudest crab that ever was
programme.desc: The twins give a grumpy Crab a lesson in good manners.

programme.title: Crosswalk Harry
programme.desc: Harry gets a job as a crosswalk guard and winds up taking his duties VERY seriously, to the point of nearly driving Gummy crazy when he wants to just cross the street.

programme.title: Rose Trick
programme.desc: Dunky is taking special care of a beautiful red rose in his garden which he plans to give it to his girlfriend in the evening. And has just stopped Cat from almost ruining it.

programme.title: Coco Jumbo
programme.desc: It’s the time of the month when the coconuts from the trees have to be removed to be send the market for sale. GrandPA has entrusted Dunky to do this job.

programme.title: BirthDay Party
programme.desc: Its GrandPAs birthday and Keet and Cat are given the task of decorating the house while Dunky is planning to make a nice cake for the evening party.

programme.title: Double Role
programme.desc: ‘Ting tong’ .. Cat opens the door to sees a milk bowl at the door step. He slurps it up and ‘ZAP’ a Cat clone is formed.

programme.title: The Rolling Rice Ball
programme.desc: WI-Go drops one of his rice balls in a rat hole and gets a handful of jewelry in return. Meanwhile, a greedy neighbor next door UGo hears the news.

programme.title: To Catch a Thief
programme.desc: A notorious robber has come to rob GrandPA’s house. He has with him a fancy paint and brush which can makes him blend seamlessly into anything.

programme.title: Bird House
programme.desc: Dunky has just finished making a nice bird house for the new pigeon family and their new babies. The new family is grateful and Keet is their chosen godmother.

programme.title: The Beginning
programme.desc: Speed has just been reunited with his father, when Zile Zazic attacks, stealing the Mach 6. Speed, Speed Sr. and the gang get the car back and defeat Zile. Speed Sr., not knowing why theyre after the car again, goes underground to investigate. Meanwhile Connor gets a strange reading off the Mach 6. Soon they discover the car has a strange anomaly - it jumps forward in space. When they start experimenting with the car they get attacked again and realize this "jump" function has something to do with why Zile was after the car.

programme.title: Baby On Loose
programme.desc: One fine day, Don finds a baby at his doorstep. But with the rats around, it is indeed a mission for don and colonel to keep the baby safe. Will the dogs keep the baby safe? What twist could possibly happen?

programme.title: Mood Music
programme.desc: Deedee and Nino hear the most horrible sounds ever and run out to find Mewmew playing his violin. And to top it off he’s inviting everyone to hear him play at the concert. Deedee encourages Mewmew along, but everyone turns her down after hearing what Mewmew plays. Tiggy throws a shoe at Mewmew mistaking the music for cats screeching, even the Doobydoos scram. Tika Pila is also enraged that Mewmew walks away so dejected. Deedee weaves a spell that makes the violin plays with so much emotion that Nino sheds a tear. Now Mewmew has to muster her spirit and prove to all of Abra-Dabra that she can really play well. First stop is at Tiggy’s, and when Mewmew plays a melancholic tune, Tiggy cries so much that Mewmew walks away sadly. The Doobydoos cry as well to the point that Mewmew totally hates what Deedee has conjured. Deedee and Nino notice that Mewmew’s violin plays according to the state of Mewmew’s emotions. Deedee and Nino devise a plan and Nino keeps Mewmew happy and practising while Deedee rounds up the townsfolk to attend the concert. Charlie goes to get the twins, but takes a quick nap instead. Though all take a while to come, Deedee and Nino lift Mewmew’s spirits so high that the entire town come rushing to the concert on hearing the joyful music Mewmew is playing. And even thought the magic spell wears off, the town still encourage Mewmew to keep on playing, for she had already proved the very best to all of them.

programme.title: Tidy Up Time
programme.desc: Deedee almost falls on her bottom, if not for Nino’s timely save, by tripping on a big red ball in her courtyard. It looks like the twins are having a playing spree but are not careful in keeping things back where they belong. Charlie can’t stand the mess any more that he posts Sandy and Boris with the chore of tidying up the entire place before he gets back from his postman duties that day. Charlie furthers the chore by cautioning them that any toys that are not kept back in their rightful places will be given away, to which the twins sadly agree. But more than tidying, the twins set out messing up what Deedee and Nino are patiently helping them with. The twins neither want Uncle Charlie to give away any of their toys nor are they able to clean it up soon enough. It seems only Deedee’s magic can help them, much to the dismay of Nino. Not only do all the toys magically shut themselves in the toy chest, all of them are nowhere to be seen when Sandy peeps in. The spell seems to have been too strong that it made the toys clear away from the home of the twins and fall in different places all over Abra-Dabra, in Tiggy’s cooking pot, inside Mayor De Pfeffle’s shoe, in Mewmew’s garden, in the front yard of the Doobydoos, and everywhere else. They all set out to get the toys back for the twins but the toy zebra and the toy frog are nowhere to be seen. Finally they find them with the Doobydoos who think the toys belong to them. So Boris and Sandy decide to give them other toys in exchange for Dr Frog and Zuzu. Uncle Charlie returns to see the twins happily play with their most favourite toys and appreciates them for making the home sparkling clean.

programme.title: Krazy Kites
programme.desc: The sky is filled with lovely colors and looks amazing with so many kites. Keet, Cat and Dunky are on the terrace flying kites .

programme.title: Kites Away!
programme.desc: It all happens for a kite! Don wants it… the rats wont let it go. And in this tug of war, an angry and frustrated King Chomp is funnily pulled into. It is a bad time for the rats and a very bad time for Don and Colonel.

programme.title: Cinema Night
programme.desc: Blockbusters have released and Don and Colonel are in the theatre to get tickets. But the naughty rats pick their pocket and buy tickets. Now the dogs are penniless and would go to any extend to get into the theatre. But when the trio enters the picture, the poor dogs suffer like anything. But, Larry Marly and Charly will end up in deep mess. Wait and watch!

programme.title: GOOD CROC, BAD CROC!
programme.desc: The Guardians enjoy a baby croc until it grows into an unmanageable mutant sent by Negu. They’ll need to train the croc, and then return it to the island Negu stole it from.

programme.title: A Rodent Fix
programme.desc: Don has a new and yummy kitchen garden. And a new thief too! For the first time, don and the rats join hands to catch the unwanted intruder. And it is indeed a veggie mess all around.

programme.title: Straw
programme.desc: Reduce waste by giving straws a second more fun life!

programme.title: Rainy Blues
programme.desc: Relentless rain and a hot cup of black tea, what more could Don ask for. Raindrops at home? As Don and Colonel take different measures to seal the cracks. Cement, tarpaulin sheets and umbrellas! The trio make sure that it isn’t an easy task.

programme.title: Hill Resort
programme.desc: Dunky, Keet and Cat arrive at a nearby hill station with GrandPA for a small holiday, just in time to realize that the local monkeys are not so friendly. A mad chase follows between the monkeys and the three of them .

programme.title: Plastic Bottle
programme.desc: Watch Hepi an Briko transform plastic bottles to something out of this world. Literally.

programme.title: Kitten up a Tree
programme.desc: When Gummy comes upon a kitten stuck up a tree, he and the gang become increasingly caught up in trying figure out ways to get it back down.

programme.title: Bubble Cars
programme.desc: As Deedee and Nino were wondering what Charlie got the twins for their birthday, Sandy whizzes past in a brand new pedal car. Boris got one too, but he doesn’t want his to get dirty at all. So he decides not to use it at all even though he misses all the fun Sandy is having. Mewmew and Sandy even have a race across town. Boris even declines a chance to race, but is entirely sceptical about it as he doesn’t even want a splash of mud to fall on it. He is even more worried when he sees Sandy’s car not working. Deedee tries to help by magically trying to create a bubble guard around Boris’s car, but the spell falls on Sandy’s car instead. Now no one can even touch the car, let alone repair it. Boris vouches to allow Sandy use his car as he acknowledges that it was his undoing that led to the creation of the bubble in the first place. Sandy is overjoyed and promises to be extra careful. So careful that Mewmew can even beat her by running on his ears. Deedee tells Boris to prove to Sandy that she can use the car faster, so Boris races with Mewmew and accidentally splashes mud over his face, but then is happy he does and enjoys the fun. He races so fast that he pops the bubble guard over Sandy’s car by crashing into it. Charlie sets down to fix the cars and the twins are driving them in a jiffy, giggling all the way.

programme.title: King Pancake
programme.desc: PANCAKE wishes he could be king so that he alone could tell everyone else what to do – only to learn that being in charge isn’t as easy as it looks. Both leaders and helpers are needed to finish any job. Giving orders and taking orders are both important to get a job done.

programme.title: The Short Report
programme.desc: Everyone is reading a popular blog gossiping about people at school. When the blog post Brains pictures of aliens, she risks having her secret identity exposed.

programme.title: Smile Like An Angel
programme.desc: Duda y sus amigos deciden hacer pareja para ir a una expedición. Scot sugiere hacer una votación y el amigo que no sea elegido tiene que ser socio de un espantapájaros. Desafortunadamente para Scot, termina con el espantapájaros. De vuelta a casa, Scot se pregunta por qué es tan impopular. Con un poco de ayuda de Piggy and Puggy y su invento el Smile Ha-ha, Scot se transforma en un "ángel sonriente" y hace que los hermanos búho anuncien a todo el mundo su nueva y mejorada personalidad. Duda corre a Scot para verlo por sí mismo, y termina causando estragos en el escondite de Scot. Scot casi explota de rabia y le ordena a Duda que se vaya. Sorprendentemente, Duda le dice a todo el mundo lo agradable y divertido que era Scot y todos aparecen en la puerta de Scot. ¿Conseguirá Scot finalmente un compañero para la próxima expedición?

programme.title: Diver Bros
programme.desc: Don and colonel are in a boat getting ready for sea diving. And anything can happen in water. Or else larry charly and marly will make sure that anything would happen. Every single creature in the turns against them and the dogs run for their life.

programme.title: Volcano
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Baghdad in Bloom
programme.desc: Aladdin buys magic seeds from the market with the food money believing the plant will bring him riches. However when it doesnt grow he and Jamillah enlist Genie to help, he does his thing and suddenly the plant grows! Everyone in town hears about the plant and comes to see it in Aladdins garden - hoping that they too will get blessed with riches. Even the Sultan comes to see its beauty. The crowd waits with bated breath but when it opens - it stinks like smelly cheese. The crowd disperse but the Sultan is transfixed by the rare scent. He sees the value and beauty in it where others dont and gives Aladdin gold in exchange for the plant.

programme.title: Simpleton – The Queen Bee
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant, FO, travel into the story of the “Queen Bee”, by the Brothers Grimm, having been called out by a KING, the father of 3 sons who set out in search of adventures. That was some time ago and none of the three has returned, and the KING has received no news. SANDRA and FO will find them, turned to stone, in an enchanted castle. The detective and her assistant will try to solve the mystery and bring the three princes back to life, taking on the guardian of the castle, a sinister, silent DWARF.

programme.title: Krazy Kites
programme.desc: The sky is filled with lovely colors and looks amazing with so many kites. Keet, Cat and Dunky are on the terrace flying kites .

programme.title: A Fishy Chase
programme.desc: Something is fishy in the air! Its Don’s new pet, a Goldfish. Charly Marly and Lary are drooling in hopes of feasting it, but not till Don is there to rescue it.

programme.title: Crazy Cricket
programme.desc: Bee stings, explosions, and with frogs croaking around, this is no ordinary game of cricket. So will Don hit a six or would it be Marly?

programme.title: Pesky Rodents – Pied Pipper
programme.desc: Sandra and Fo go into the tale of the Pied Piper of Hamelin, called by the town’s schoolmistress. There, they discover that something very strange has happened in the story. The Pied Piper, with his magic flute, has taken off all the children and has left the mice in the town, contradicting the classic sequence of events. The detective and her assistant must solve the mystery and return the children to their families safe and sound.

programme.title: I Gotta Go !
programme.desc: Rise and Shine Don- it’s a normal morning at the Doggy household…but wait.. whats the mice upto in the bathroom…Looks like there is no way Don can start his day normally ever!

programme.title: Misadventure
programme.desc: The painter inside Don has woken and he must have his painting on the wall. But the rats are ready even to turn the world upside down to stop Don from fulfilling his dream. And you can imagine what will follow. But whatever happens in between, it is all a sweet happy ending.

programme.title: A Fog of A Different Color
programme.desc: When the Foggy messes with the Zoonicorns colors, Maple learns that the appearance of a thing does not define what it is. It’s not what’s on the outside that makes a thing/person what it is, but what’s on the inside

programme.title: Ski Trip Fun!
programme.desc: Don and Colonel are on a vacation, skiing in Shimla. You think the trio would leave them alone?? Hell no!! Romance blossoms in the snow and the rats make sure that Don and Colonel turn against each other. And they have a great time watching them fight.

programme.title: Halloween
programme.desc: Gummy, Harry and Kala head off to a scary Halloween costume party – but the winner of the ‘Best Costume’ prize.... isn’t wearing a costume, and is actually a real monster!

programme.title: Rainbow Show
programme.desc: Its the day of the Extreme Glow Rainbow. Zip wants to prove shes her own Smighty without her twin brother, Zap, so she grabs hold of the Air Stone which she cannot control. The Air region twists and turns and the Smighties need to be saved from the Villains trap.

programme.title: Lets Get Kraken
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: You Don’t Say
programme.desc: PANCAKE and ODESSA’S friendship is strained when the young otter unknowingly offends Odessa. In the Zooniverse, Pancake learns a lesson when he and the Zoonicorns picnic in Echo Canyon where hurtful words which turn into irritating little creatures, Words can hurt.

programme.title: The Lord, Lost
programme.desc: When Xia and April go to fetch Pai after he’s spent the night guarding the Magic Fort, they find out that the Glove of the North has disappeared. While they blame Pai for the disaster, Amkko and Koto steal the Lord of the Wind. The Guardians try to get it back, only to discover it was all a cunning plan to distract them and steal the Glove of the North! But hadn’t they stolen it already? No! Pai was keeping it safe in a place they would never have guessed.

programme.title: FIRE AWAY!
programme.desc: On a chilly morning, Xia tries to heat things up with his Golden Katana, but keeps accidentally setting fires. He does no better as the Dragon Warrior. When Negu sends a mutant Heat Monster, the Guardians will have to fight fire with fire…or possibly water.

programme.title: The Supreme Law – Simbad
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant, the elf Fo, travel into the story of Sinbad the Sailor, having been called out by PRINCESS ARIBA, the daughter of the GRAND CALIPH. There, they learn that the intrepid sailor has been arrested by the VIZIER, accused of having broken a supreme law: lying to the Grand Caliph, when recounted the stories of his incredible voyages to him. Unless someone does something, SINBAD will be executed in 12 hours’ time. SANDRA and FO must find irrefutable proof that the wonders described by SINBAD are true, while at the same time escaping from the claws of the evil VIZIER.

programme.title: Bailarina
programme.desc: Mira hace hasta lo imposible para convertirse en la mejor bailarina. Ana empuja a Mira a cometer un crimen.

programme.title: Bailarina
programme.desc: Mira hace hasta lo imposible para convertirse en la mejor bailarina. Ana empuja a Mira a cometer un crimen.

programme.title: Bailarina
programme.desc: Mira hace hasta lo imposible para convertirse en la mejor bailarina. Ana empuja a Mira a cometer un crimen.

programme.title: Bailarina
programme.desc: Mira hace hasta lo imposible para convertirse en la mejor bailarina. Ana empuja a Mira a cometer un crimen.

programme.title: Bailarina
programme.desc: Mira hace hasta lo imposible para convertirse en la mejor bailarina. Ana empuja a Mira a cometer un crimen.

programme.title: NTD Evening News
programme.desc: News from the U.S. and around the world.

programme.title: Super Dad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?" in their children’s eyes. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?"

programme.title: Soul Detective
programme.desc: "An officer from the underworld joins forces with a policeman to track down evil spirits that have escaped to the mortal realm. Together, they explore the good and evil of human nature. This drama combines traditional and modern elements to bring a new fantasy experience to the audience. "

programme.title: Soul Detective
programme.desc: "An officer from the underworld joins forces with a policeman to track down evil spirits that have escaped to the mortal realm. programme.title: Its In Our Nature
programme.desc: A million wildlife species are facing the threat of extinction. But why does this matter to a tiny city state like Singapore? What do we stand to lose if our wildlife go extinct? Host Lam Shushan comes face to face with some of the rarest creatures in the world and meets the tenacious frontliners who are racing to save our native wildlife from extinction.

programme.title: Its In Our Nature
programme.desc: A million wildlife species are facing the threat of extinction. But why does this matter to a tiny city state like Singapore? What do we stand to lose if our wildlife go extinct? Host Lam Shushan comes face to face with some of the rarest creatures in the world and meets the tenacious frontliners who are racing to save our native wildlife from extinction.

programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: Crave
programme.desc: Warning: do not watch Crave on an empty stomach. Because we’ll have you craving a creamy scoop of ice cream bedded on a crispy waffle. Or really, really needing to crunch into juicy fried chicken right now. Hosted by Charlotte Mei, the runner-up of Eat List Star, Crave finds out what gets celebrities salivating – roti prata, roast meats, sushi, satay, salted egg ice cream, buah keluak, and even an English-style big breakfast! Our celebrities’ cravings know no bounds, and anything from local to Japanese to Mediterranean fare is fair game – as long as they crave it. And there’s a little special by Charlotte. On every show, she will cook a dish – guaranteed to make you crave for it!

programme.title: Crave
programme.desc: Warning: do not watch Crave on an empty stomach. Because we’ll have you craving a creamy scoop of ice cream bedded on a crispy waffle. Or really, really needing to crunch into juicy fried chicken right now. Hosted by Charlotte Mei, the runner-up of Eat List Star, Crave finds out what gets celebrities salivating – roti prata, roast meats, sushi, satay, salted egg ice cream, buah keluak, and even an English-style big breakfast! Our celebrities’ cravings know no bounds, and anything from local to Japanese to Mediterranean fare is fair game – as long as they crave it. And there’s a little special by Charlotte. On every show, she will cook a dish – guaranteed to make you crave for it!

programme.title: Its In Our Nature
programme.desc: A million wildlife species are facing the threat of extinction. But why does this matter to a tiny city state like Singapore? What do we stand to lose if our wildlife go extinct? Host Lam Shushan comes face to face with some of the rarest creatures in the world and meets the tenacious frontliners who are racing to save our native wildlife from extinction.

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: Page Miss Glory 1936

programme.title: Cookin' with Gags 1955
programme.desc: The boys are taking Olive on a picnic. It's April 1, and Bluto plays a series of "jokes" on Popeye, though of course they go beyond the bounds of acceptability, particularly once they get to the picnic grounds; Bluto puts gasoline on the fire he asks Popeye to light and swaps a beehive for the lemonade. Bluto then launches a cruel joke against Olive and frames Popeye. The capper: he replaces Popeye's spinach with a joke can, and runs off with Olive for some canoeing. But Popeye gets the last laugh with an inflatable sea monster.

programme.title: Pest Pupil 1957
programme.desc: Baby Huey, the over-sized duck, is enrolled in kindergarten but his size and clumsy attempts to fit in causes such havoc that he is expelled by the teacher. His mother then hires a private tutor, who is led a life of misery due to Huey's efforts to do good that unintentionally backfire. But the tutor winds up in the ocean---unless Huey lived on a shark-infested lake---and and is about to become a shark meal but Huey saves his life...and gets his diploma as a reward from the grateful tutor.

programme.title: A Date to Skate 1938
programme.desc: Popeye takes Olive roller skating in a rink; she's never skated before, so he has to teach her, and she's not exactly a quick learner. After a while, she ends up outside the rink, and still out of control; she skates through a department store and causes major traffic problems. When she gets stuck on a speeding fire truck, Popeye realizes he'll need his spinach, but he's out fortunately, an audience member tosses him a can.

programme.title: Robinhood Makes Good 1939
programme.desc: Three little squirrels act out the story of Robin Hood. A fox, thinking he can make a meal out of them, joins in. The squirrels have to find a way to get rid of the fox.

programme.title: Boo Moon
programme.desc: Casper emerges from a subway station, following a crowd of scared strangers. He encounters a man saying "see the wonders of the moon for ten cents," and offering a sight through a telescope. Casper scares the man away, then uses the telescope to see the moon. He then flies to the moon for a visit. Casper lands on the moon, disappointed to find no man on the moon. He lies down to nap, then tiny moon men emerge from holes. They capture Casper, like Lilliputians did to Gulliver, then place him in a cage on wheels, in which they tow him to the Ruler of the Moon, King Luna. The King addresses Casper as a monster, and treats him as an enemy. Casper playfully picks up King Luna, and the king has him placed in the royal dungeon. A dejected Casper is imprisoned. Then animated trees attack the city of the moon men. The moon men defend their fortified city with flaming missiles. The tree monsters fight back with water, then break through the town walls. When the fight seems lost to the tree monsters, Casper escapes his cage, and helps the moon men. Casper goes underground. The friendly ghost then pulls trees' parts through the moon surface and ties them together, immobilizing the trees. The frustrated trees writhe and strain against the knots Casper has tied. Casper and the moon men have won. Then, and only then, does King Luna embrace Casper as a friend. King Luna knights Casper for the valiant defense of his people. Then all the moon men join in singing the Casper theme song.

programme.title: Popeye the Sailor Meets Ali Baba's Forty Thieves 1937
programme.desc: Popeye the Sailor, accompanied by Olive Oyl and Wimpy, is dispatched to stop the dreaded bandit Abu Hassan and his force of forty thieves.

programme.title: The Paneless Window Washer 1937
programme.desc: On the outside of an office building, Popeye and Bluto duke it out as rival window washers.

programme.title: My Man Geoffrey 1936
programme.desc: A scatterbrained socialite hires a vagrant as a family butler - but there's more to Godfrey than meets the eye.

programme.title: Parlor, Bedroom and Bath-1931
programme.desc: A man tries passing off a socially awkward fellow as a Casanova in the hopes of marrying off his would be sister-in-law.

programme.title: The Fourth Alarm-1926
programme.desc: The gang organizes their own junior fire department by converting an old barn into a firehouse. Later, going to a real fire proved difficult for them especially Farina who couldn't quite handle his heavily pressured fire hose.

programme.title: Pool Sharks-1915
programme.desc: Two romantic rivals play a game of pool for the hand of their lady love.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show: Season 3; Episode 17;High Noon in May berry
programme.desc: A hard, wounded man with gun in hand comes to Mayberry looking for Andy. Barney, aiming to keep their sheriff alive, deputizes Otis and Gomer.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show 1963; Season 3; Episode 19;Class Reunion
programme.desc: At his high school class reunion, Andy finds that, while memories may fade over time, some connections are never completely broken, and some hearts never completely heal

programme.title: Behind the Blend

Get ready for an illuminating conversation that pulls back the curtain on the world of Oliva.

programme.title: Who Saw The Men In Black
Guest Malcolm-Jamal Warner
programme.desc: Malcolm-Jamal Warner was Theo on the Cosby Show but his career and his life are way bigger than that. We go through his whole career from Cosby to Malcolm and Eddie (which was contentious) to his fascinating musical career. This is an awesome conversation.

programme.title: Guest Eric Hall
programme.desc: Singer-songwriter Eric Hall talks new music, touring with Beyonce and Mary J. Blige, and the current state of the music industry.

programme.title: Guest Ghostface Killah
programme.desc: Ghostface Killah is one of the greatest MCs of all time and an old friend. Amazing convo about music, the Wu, and where he’s at in life.

programme.title: Guests Vina Love, Mac Mills, LeeAnah James
programme.desc: Contestants answer trivia questions about Aquarius celebrities, trending news, music & entertainment, and Black History & Culture to win cash prizes.

programme.title: Garlic "Butter" Mushrooms OMG!
programme.desc: This mouth-watering dish is 100% dairy-free and yet SO buttery!

programme.title: Plant Pure Nation
programme.desc: The documentary that could save your life! Watch the documentary PlantPure Nation for FREE!

programme.title: Gods In Shackles
programme.desc: A powerful exposé revealing how India's temple elephants are abused in the name of religion.

programme.title: Blue Hour
programme.desc: Olivia Brandreth was nine years old when her father disappeared. Twenty five years later, she has returned to her childhood home to finally get closure in an unrelenting attempt to set the record straight...

programme.title: The Elevator (ITN)
programme.desc: A reporter discovers all is not as it seems at an infamous hotel...

programme.title: Horror High 2020 Tyler J. Case
programme.desc: A monster lurks around a high school in the hypnotized town of Willow Hills and picks off tardy students one by one. Now it is up to an unlikely group of teens to put an end to the terror that has plagued many...

programme.title: Isla Pitón
programme.desc: Un grupo de personas que buscan un árbol mágico en una selva misteriosa descubren que no están solos. Algo los observa, esperando el momento perfecto para atacar...

programme.title: Jack y Jill: Las Colinas del Infierno
programme.desc: Tras buscar a su hija desaparecida, una dama y su grupo de búsqueda descubren la leyenda que se esconde tras la pareja asesina de Jack y Jill...

programme.title: Ouija: Reunión Mortal
programme.desc: Sucesos extraños les ocurren a unos amigos antes de una fiesta de cumpleaños en un gran almacén. Dos de ellos encuentran un viejo tablero de espiritismo y deciden contactar con los antiguos inquilinos de la víctima fallecida...

programme.title: El Resurgir de la Momia
programme.desc: Un grupo de estudiantes de arqueología despierta a una momia ancestral. Tras quedar atrapados en un bucle temporal, la única forma de escapar es derrotarla. A medida que aumenta el número de cadáveres, parece que la Momia debe recolectar las almas de quienes la despertaron para poder caminar sobre la tierra, para siempre...

programme.title: El Pistolero
programme.desc: Uno de los hombres más poderosos de México llega a un pueblo en busca de nuevos pistoleros que quieran formal parte de su equipo, y recluta a un hombre sencillo que acepta el trabajo porque quiere vengar la muerte de su padre.

programme.title: Brindis Mortal
programme.desc: te presentamos la historia de Ramon, el hijo de un poderoso narcotraficante quien anhela convertirse en la mano derecha de su padre y formar parte de su grupo de sicarios. Pero su padre aun no lo considera listo para el trabajo y le da largas. lo cual desespera a Ramon y lo lleva a tomar decisiones que cambiaran para siempre la relación entre padre e hijo.

programme.title: Amor Interés y Muerte
programme.desc: La ambición es la causa por la que unos padres obligan a su hija menor a casarse con un hombre de 50 años para asegurar un futuro lleno de comodidades, sin embargo no contaban con que las cosas no saldrían como lo tenían planeado.

programme.title: Aerosol
programme.desc: El líder de una banda mexicana mata a un oponente en la guerra de pandillas en los 80's, por lo que huye a la ciudad de Los Ángeles, California. Dieciocho años después regresa al barrio sin un objetivo definido, sólo para encontrar a su hermano menor, involucrado en las pandillas de hoy. El crimen organizado utiliza niños para distribuir droga en los barrios. En combatir la corrupción y el crimen que hay en el barrio, Nuk encuentra un significado para su retorno y un camino para redimir las muertes que causó

programme.title: Borrar de la Memoria
programme.desc: Una historia de amor se transforma en una historia de persecuciones y asesinatos sin esclarecer en el contexto de la masacre estudiantil de octubre de 1968. Más de 40 años después, un periodista tenaz se da a la tarea de aclarar los crímenes bajo condiciones muy peligrosas, con el objetivo de llevar la verdad ante la justicia. Ello representa un esfuerzo dedicado a obligar a un país a reconocer la negación de la reconciliación y el cierre de trágicos acontecimientos políticos y sociales en su historia.

programme.title: Insignis
programme.desc: La vida de Jorge y Felipe, dos jóvenes amigos, da un vuelco del día que encuentran un cráneo enterrado en el jardín de uno de ellos. Comienza entonces una espiral de extraños acontecimientos, marcados por intensos sueños y oscuras apariciones, que acosan a los dos protagonistas y a las personas que les rodean. La decisión de tomar cartas en el asunto e intentar contactar con las fuerzas que han despertado, sólo servirá para llevarlos a un mundo de horror y agonía del cual no hay retorno.

programme.title: El Regreso
programme.desc: Adolescentes curiosos visitan una casa embrujada donde una vez fue asesinado un niño pequeño. Un asaltante invisible comienza a apuñalarlos.

programme.title: Entre Brujas y Nahuales
programme.desc: En la ciudad de Tulancingo Hidalgo, Acatlán y San Dionicio la gente anda muy asustada, pues se rumora que están ocurriendo sucesos fuera de lo normal, tal como desaparición de niños de quienes se han encontrado cuerpos sin sangre, dicen que son las brujas, porque han visto bolas de fuego que aparecen y desaparecen, pero nadie sabe la verdad lo que esta pasando y existe mucho miedo en la población de la región.

programme.title: Look Forward Not Far
programme.desc: We all go through times when we’re looking ahead, and our future looks uncertain. We want clarity, but instead, God gives us the courage to move forward in faith. It’s in these moments we learn not to be driven by what’s easy but to be pulled forward by purpose.

programme.title: New Number Same Name
programme.desc: If you’re looking at what’s next and feeling nervous, remember this: What God has done in your life is only the foundation, not the finish line. He’s a creative God, still at work in ways you’re not expecting. Let go of your plan so God can show you His purpose.

programme.title: Running For A Reason
programme.desc: Our expectation of God must not be that there will never be anything chasing us in life but that we are chosen while we are chased. In “Running For A Reason,” Pastor Steven Furtick reminds us that even though God has placed something significant in us, certain development can only happen in the caves of our lives.

programme.title: Breaking The Bondage Of Wrong Belief
programme.desc: The belief that we need something other than God is what keeps us from going through breakthroughs. That’s how we can be in covenant with God but still in captivity. In “Breaking The Bondage Of Wrong Belief,” Pastor Steven Furtick helps us break up with what’s been holding us back.
